title: Need a font that looks like FDA Logo
content:
Is there a typeface similar to this?

| --- | --- |
| [FDA.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043310/http:/typophile.com/files/FDA.gif) | 2.75 KB |
author: DogBot

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/stop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043310/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/stop/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/stop/")

This has some of the characteristics, but will need quite some work

[http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=2&nb\_ppp=50](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218043310/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=2&nb_ppp=50 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=303&page=2&nb\_ppp=50")

or maybe something in this theme.

Tim
